required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Losartan Potassium/Hydrochlorothiazide 100/25 mg Tablets in Healthy Subjects Under Non-Fasting Conditions
clinical_study.official_title: A Relative Bioavailability Study of Losartan Potassium/Hydrochlorothiazide 100/25 mg Tablets Under Non-Fasting Conditions

brief_summary.textblock: The objective of this study is to compare the relative bioavailability of Losartan potassium/Hydrochlorothiazide 100/25 mg tablets (manufactured by Teva Pharmaceutical Industries, Ltd. and distributed by Teva Pharmaceuticals USA) with that of Hyzaar® 100/25 mg tablets (Merck) in healthy, adult, non-smoking subjects under non-fasting conditions.

detailed_description.textblock:
Criteria for Evaluation: FDA Bioequivalence Criteria
Statistical Methods: FDA Bioequivalence Statistical Methods

primary_outcome.measure: Cmax of Losartan(Maximum Observed Concentration of Drug Substance in Plasma)
primary_outcome.time_frame: Blood samples collected over a 48 hour period.

primary_outcome.measure: AUC0-t of Losartan(Area Under the Concentration-time Curve From Time Zero to Time of Last Measurable Concentration)
primary_outcome.time_frame: Blood samples collected over a 48 hour period.

primary_outcome.measure: AUC0-inf of Losartan(Area Under the Concentration-time Curve From Time Zero to Infinity)
primary_outcome.time_frame: Blood samples collected over a 48 hour period.

primary_outcome.measure: Cmax of Hydrochlorothiazide(Maximum Observed Concentration of Drug Substance in Plasma)
primary_outcome.time_frame: Blood samples collected over a 48 hour period.

primary_outcome.measure: AUC0-t of Hydrochlorothiazide(Area Under the Concentration-time Curve From Time Zero to Time of Last Measurable Concentration)
primary_outcome.time_frame: Blood samples collected over a 48 hour period.

primary_outcome.measure: AUC0-inf of Hydrochlorothiazide(Area Under the Concentration-time Curve From Time Zero to Infinity)
primary_outcome.time_frame: Blood samples collected over a 48 hour period.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Healthy, non-smoking, male and female subjects at least 18 years of age.
- BMI (body mass index) of 30 or less.
- Females in this study must be physically unable to become pregnant (postmenopausal for at least 6 months or surgically sterile).
- Successful completion of a physical examination within 28 days of initiation of the study.
- Negative serum pregnancy test (females).
Exclusion Criteria:
- Subjects with a significant recent history of chronic alcohol consumption (past 2 years), drug addiction, or serious gastrointestinal, renal, hepatic, or cardiovascular disease, tuberculosis, epilepsy, asthma (past 5 years), diabetes, psychosis, or glaucoma will not be eligible for this study.
- Subjects whose clinical laboratory test values are outside the reference range and are deemed clinically significant by the Principle Investigator.
- Subjects who have a history of allergic responses to the classes of drugs being tested will be excluded from the study.
- Subjects who use tobacco in any form will not be eligible to participate in the study. 3 months abstinence is required.
- Subjects found to have urine concentrations of any of the tested drugs of abuse will not be allowed to participate.
- Subjects should not have donated blood and/or plasma for at least 30 days prior to the first dosing of the study.
- Subjects who have taken any investigational drug within 30 days prior to the first dosing of the study will not be allowed to participate.
- Female subjects who are pregnant or who are able (women with child bearing potential) to become pregnant during the study will not be allowed to participate.
- All female subjects will be screened for pregnancy at check-in each study period. Subjects with positive or inconclusive results will be withdrawn from the study.
- Subjects who do not tolerate venipuncture will not be allowed to participate.

group.title: Losartan/HCTZ (Test) First
group.description: 100/25 mg Losartan potassium/Hydrochlorothiazide test product dosed in first period followed by 100/25 mg Hyzaar® Tablets reference product dosed in the second period.

group.title: Hyzaar® (Reference) First
group.description: 100/25 mg Hyzaar® Tablets reference product dosed in first period followed by 100/25 mg Losartan potassium/Hydrochlorothiazide test product dosed in the second period.

group.title: Losartan/HCTZ (Test) First
group.description: 100/25 mg Losartan potassium/Hydrochlorothiazide test product dosed in first period followed by 100/25 mg Hyzaar® Tablets reference product dosed in the second period.

group.title: Hyzaar® (Reference) First
group.description: 100/25 mg Hyzaar® Tablets reference product dosed in first period followed by 100/25 mg Losartan potassium/Hydrochlorothiazide test product dosed in the second period.

outcome.title: Cmax of Losartan(Maximum Observed Concentration of Drug Substance in Plasma)
outcome.time_frame: Blood samples collected over a 48 hour period.
outcome.population: All participants that completed the study had their samples analyzed.

group.title: Losartan/HCTZ (Test)
group.description: 100/25 mg Losartan potassium/Hydrochlorothiazide test product dosed in either period.

group.title: Hyzaar® (Reference)
group.description: 100/25 mg Hyzaar® Tablets reference product dosed in either period.

measure.title: Cmax of Losartan(Maximum Observed Concentration of Drug Substance in Plasma)
measure.population: All participants that completed the study had their samples analyzed.

analysis.non_inferiority_desc: ANOVA is to be used to identify the source contributions by factors including subjects, period, formulation and potential interactions. The geometric mean ratio together with the ANOVA residual mean error term are used to identify the statistical basis for the 90% confidence interval for the ratio of the population means (Test [T]/Reference[R]) of the identified metrics (e.g. AUC, Cmax).
analysis.param_type: Ratio of the T/R geometric mean x 100
analysis.estimate_desc: Bioequivalence is established if the 90% confidence interval for the ln-transformed geometric mean between the reference (R) and test (T) product fall within the interval of 80-125%.

outcome.title: AUC0-t of Losartan(Area Under the Concentration-time Curve From Time Zero to Time of Last Measurable Concentration)
outcome.time_frame: Blood samples collected over a 48 hour period.
outcome.population: All participants that completed the study had their samples analyzed.

reported_events.time_frame: Adverse event data was collected over the course of the study, which was approximately 2 weeks in duration.
reported_events.desc: Volunteers were monitored throughout the study for any adverse experiences. AEs were collected through both solicited and unsolicited methods. The volunteers were encouraged to report signs, symptoms, and any changes in health to the clinic staff.

group.title: Losartan/HCTZ (Test)

certain_agreements.pi_employee: Principal Investigators are NOT employed by the organization sponsoring the study.
certain_agreements.restrictive_agreement: The Principal Investigator is not permitted to discuss or publish trial results.
